name: Cursor Farm
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 52 

---About the game---

Here, you is a cursor farm, you objetive is simple, only plant, harvest, sell (automatic),

increase you farm, buy animals, gain experience for up Farmer Skills, Trader Skills and Tools Skills! you will got Awards for hard work, can change the graphics effects, sounds and more

if you click on pause button, you will recover all money spend on grow up seeds

--HOW2PLAY?(Controls)--

See name of game friend! all you need need is cursor of you mouse! for restart the game press 1,2,1,2,1,2,1,2,1,2...... (dont make this)

keep pressing mouse button and pass for all grow up plants to do

a fast harvest!

--Helping you on play--

if you dont have money, wait small plant respawn and collect for take a money!

Click on Shop, look things, prices, look Level Menu, for increase! skills, click on Respawn plaint for collect a small reward all time!

All Game Art and Scripts Created by Metroid Games
